attributes.action: Make pepper spray legal to own
attributes.additional_details: Following an unacceptable increase in sexual crimes against women and children, it is clear to me that they are unsafe anywhere in the country. This must change. By carrying pepper spray, women and children will be able to feel safe again, as is their right.
attributes.background: Pepper spray is an irritant spray used for self-defence. It is, however, illegal to own pepper spray in the UK. This must be changed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634452
